entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 06:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure: 103.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2
